quote.content: If it takes less than 5 minutes do it now.
quote.author: Unknown

quote.content: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.
quote.author: Milton Berle

quote.content: Nothing happens to any man that he is not formed by nature to bear.
quote.author: Marcus Aurelius

quote.content: Yesterday is not ours to recover, but tomorrow is ours to win or lose.
quote.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quote.content: By three methods we may learn wisdom: First, by reflection, which is noblest; Second, by imitation, which is easiest; and third by experience, which is the bitterest.
quote.author: Confucius

quote.content: Reject your sense of injury and the injury itself disappears.
quote.author: Marcus Aurelius

quote.content: People may hear your words, but they feel your attitude.
quote.author: John C. Maxwell

quote.content: The shoe that fits one person pinches another; there is no recipe for living that suits all cases.
quote.author: Carl Jung

quote.content: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
quote.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote.content: That which does not kill us makes us stronger.
quote.author: Friedrich Nietzsche
